Hyeri Profile: Hyeri Facts and Ideal Type

Hyeri (혜리) is a South Korean actress and singer under Sublime Artist Agency. She debuted as a member of Girl’s Day in 2010. She debuted as an actress in 2012.

Stage Name: Hyeri (혜리)

Birth Name: Lee Hyeri (이혜리)

Birthday: June 9, 1994

Zodiac Sign: Gemini

Height: 167 cm (5’6″)

Weight: 54 kg (119 lbs)

Blood Type: AB

Instagram: hyeri_0609

Twitter: girls_day_hyeri

YouTube: 혜리

VLive: HYERI

Hyeri Facts:

– She was born in Gwangju, South Korea.

– She is a member of Girl’s Day.

– Education: Seoul School of Performing Arts, Konkuk University (Film major)

– She has a younger sister, Lee Hyerim (2 years younger).

– Hyeri was scouted by Dream T Entertainment when she was in middle school.

– Hyeri joined Girl’s Day in September 2010, alongside Yura, when Jiin and Jisun left the group.

– She was named “Nation’s Little Sister” by South Korean netizens.

– Hyeri acted in the dramas: “Tasty Life” (2012), “Seonam Girls High School Investigators ” (2014), “Hyde Jekyll, Me” (2015), “Reply 1988” (2016), “Entertainer” (2016), “Two Cops” (2017), “Miss Lee ” (2019), “Record of Youth” (2020), “My Roommate is a Gumiho” (2021), “Moonshine” (2021-22), “May I Help You” (2022).

– According to the members, Hyeri is the highest paid member of Girl’s Day. (Tvn’s “Taxi”)

– She likes watching movies and reading books.

– She’s good at running marathons and writing.

– In 2016, on the Lunar New Year, Hyeri donated ₩50 million to Community Chest of Korea in order to help improving elderly welfare.

– Hyeri is best friends with Rosé (Blackpink). (source: Amazing Saturday)

– Hyeri was in a relationship with H.O.T’s member Tony An (started in March 2013) but they broke up after 8 months.

– Since August 2017, Hyeri is dating Ryu Jun Yeol (they were both lead actor/actress in “Reply 1988”).

– On January 11, 2019 Hyeri’s contract with Dream Tea Ent. expired and she decided to not renew.

– On April 30, 2019 Hyeri revealed to have signed exclusive contract with Creative group ING.

– On May 24, Sublime Artist Agency officially announced that Hyeri had signed an exclusive contract with the company.

– Hyeri’s ideal type: a man who can take good care of her.
